## Optional:

- [Data Analysis Using Regression and Multilevel/Hierarchical Models](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/052168689X/ref=as_li_qf_sp_asin_il_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=052168689X&linkCode=as2&tag=andrsblog0f-20&linkId=PX5B5V6ZPCT2UIYV) by Gelman A., and Hill, J.:
    + Section 3: Linear regression: the basics
    + Section 4: Linear regression: before and after fitting the model

- [An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R](http://faculty.marshall.usc.edu/gareth-james/ISL/) by James, G., Witten, D., Hastie, T., and Tibshirani, R.:
    + Section 3: Linear regression (you can skip section 3.5)
